quadrants.title: Software engineering & development practices
quadrants.description: This segment focuses on software development tools, programming languages, frameworks, and methodologies that enable the creation of scalable, maintainable, secure, and high-quality software.

quadrants.title: Infrastructure & Platform Engineering
quadrants.description: This segment captures the tools and platforms used for deploying, managing, and monitoring applications at scale.

quadrants.title: Collaboration Platform
quadrants.description: This segment highlights tools, platforms, and practices that facilitate team collaboration, communication, and agile project management.

quadrants.title: Data Processing
quadrants.description: This quadrant focuses on data engineering practices and pipelines built to process, transform, and serve data at scale.

labels.title: SKAO Technology Watch
labels.footer: SKAO Technology Watch is a continuous assessment and tracking initiative focused on identifying, evaluating, and integrating relevant tools, platforms, and practices that align with our strategic goals in software development, infrastructure, data processing, and team collaboration. This process ensures our engineering efforts remain modern, scalable, secure, and aligned with evolving technological standards.
labels.notUpdated: This item was not updated in last three versions of the Watch. Should it have appeared in one of the more recent editions, there is a good chance it remains pertinent. However, if the item dates back further, its relevance may have diminished and our current evaluation could vary. Regrettably, our capacity to consistently revisit items from past Radar editions is limited.
labels.pageAbout: How to use SKAO Technology Watch
labels.metaDescription: Find tools and services used in SKAO Technology Watch.
